summary: This bill, the EO 14190 Act of 2025, introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to codify Executive Order 14190. This Executive Order focuses on ending what the bill labels as "radical indoctrination" in K-12 schooling. The bill states the Executive Order will have the force and effect of law. It was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce, as well as Committees on Armed Services and Foreign Affairs.
